meanings.definition: Attached or connected to something as a subordinate or supplementary part.
meanings.sent1: The appendant decorations on the cake made it look even more beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The small appendant pouch on the backpack is perfect for storing keys.
meanings.sent3: The appendant bow tie on the dog's collar made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was like an appendant light, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The appendant stars in the night sky twinkled with magic.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is attached or added as a supplement.
meanings.sent1: She always carries her lucky appendant charm with her.
meanings.sent2: The appendant to the team brought fresh ideas to the project.
meanings.sent3: The little appendant to the group always tells funny jokes.
meanings.sent4: His laughter was like an appendant melody to the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The appendant flower in the bouquet added a pop of color.
